result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony R. Jimenez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Capture an Image of Nudity, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 942.09(2)(am)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime work/fulltime schooling or combination. If not fully engaged, must complete 30 hours community service a week.

No contact with L.M.M.
No contact with persons under 18 years old unless approved by agent.

Assessment, treatment, and counseling as recommended.
Letter of apology to L.M.M.
Sex Offender registry
No objection to transfer probation.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony R. Jimenez

Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Kyle Reimann;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. 

PLEA: Ct. 1 (Capture an Image of Nudity)>> GUILTY.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H- 3 Years Probation. CONDITIONS: I/S - 3 1/2 years WSPS, 1 1/2 years IC and 2 years ES., Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time schooling or combination and when not fully engaged must complete 30 hours of Community Service a week, No Contact with L.M.M, No Contact with no persons under 18 unless approved by agent, Letter of Apology to L.M.M., Court Costs, Register for Sex Offender Registry. No objection to transfer of the Probation. 

COURT finds 370 days jail credit.
